author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Place the flour, eggs, cream and milk into a bowl. Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper and mix well to make a batter the consistency of double cream. Heat the olive oil in a small non-stick frying pan over a medium heat and place the sausages into the pan. Pour over the batter and cook for 6-8 minutes, or until the batter has set. To serve, cut the toad-in-the-hole into wedges and place onto small plates.
ingredients: 100g/3Â½oz plain flour,  2 free-range eggs,  2 tbsp double cream,  5 tbsp milk,  salt and freshly ground black pepper ,  1 tbsp olive oil,  4 Polish Kabanos sausages
